snippet.title: AfterLoop - SOLVE | EXPLORE | DISCOVER - Out Now!
snippet.description:
Play now on Mobile and TV :
http://exiin.com/games/AfterLoop/

AfterLoop is a fun adventure puzzle game, where you play as an utility robot stuck in a mysterious non-euclidean maze. Your goal is to solve handcrafted puzzles, explore beautiful environments of this mysterious world and help the robot find answers. Behind the scenes, AfterLoop develops critical thinking by providing a wide range of clever puzzles. Starting from simple ones that anyone can solve then softly increasing the difficulty to provide more challenge as you become better at solving them.

Music by "& Days" ( https://soundcloud.com/ndaystybg )
